title: Project Zomboid Cheats dec 2014
description:
These inventory cheats are for build 30.6 (12/2014) and most other versions.
Fort time is upon us once more.

I made this one for construction. 
Look in Steam/SteamApps/common/ProjectZomboid/media/scripts - items or media/scripts - newitems for other inventory items to add/replace in NTMII file.

Based upon Not Too Much Items mod, made by acex222.

1. Put NTMII in gamedirectory/media/lua/client folder.

2. In-game, hold F8-key and press a letter key after that.

F8+O=Axe
F8+X=Hammer
F8+Z=Saw
F8+U=Nails
F8+L=Plank
F8+B=Hinge
F8+N=Doorknob

Optional, for when creating a character:

Find CharacterCreationProfession in
Steam/SteamApps/common/ProjectZomboid/media/lua/client/OptionScreens

and turn self.pointToSpend = 0;
into self.pointToSpend= 48;

to have all the good traits.

Green greetings!

Easipak

ps. Single player only. Most servers will notice difference in LUA files. 
So before going online, remove NTMII. And restore CharacterCreationProfession if you changed it
